name: Fnf SOS-engine
description:
Just another Fnf engine..

Improvements (compared to the vanilla version of Fnf): 

  • A great Input System
  • Trail notes look good even at low BPM
  • Modding is made easier (will explain later)
  • Added an Options Menu full of options
  • Made the cameras and the icons bop smoothly
  • Custom cache system for mods
  • Fixed some small issues here and there

Current Issues:

  • The week 6 dialogue box makes the game crash.

Options:

----Gameplay options----

  • Downscroll
  • MiddleScroll
  • GhostTapping
  • Botplay
  • Song speed/pitch
  • Custom HealthBar Colors (gets the most used color of the icon representing that character)
  • Show Extended Score (Score + Misses + Accuracy)
  • Accuracy Type (complex, simple)
  • Show Time 
  • Time Type (time left, time elapsed)
  • Enemy Strums (Animated, Static)

-----Video Options-----

  • Start With Fullscreen
  • Fps Cap
  • Show Fps
  • Show Memory (Usage)
  • Color Effect (some color effects like "grayscale")
  • VCR (Custom VCR Filter available in the options menu for the preview!)

-------Controls-------

  • Reset Key ( R )
  • Set Keys ( Opens a state for selecting keys )

---Mod Options----

  • Mod Cache (onLoad, onStart, off)

Modding

The Engine Uses a somewhat complicated system for modding so i can't explain it here. I might make a documentation or something on how to add Characters, Songs etc.
